titulo: Policarpa Salavarrieta: Una Historia Contada (Texto Completo) [Policarpa Salavarrieta ]
descripcion:
Policarpa became prominent in history because she turned out to be the link between the supporters of the independence movement and the guerrillas on the Eastern Plains of Colombia. Imprisoned in the College of Our Lady of the Rosario, she died by gunshot next to her boyfriend, Alejo Savarain.
Note: This is audiobook is in Spanish.
